qSpeakDescription: Your local desktop voice assistant for coding, dictation, and more.
selectLanguageForTranscription: Select the language for transcription and voice commands
chooseMicrophoneForVoiceInput: Choose which microphone qSpeak should use for voice input
microphoneTip: For best results, use a high-quality microphone. You can change this setting later in the settings.
selectModelForSpeechToText: Select which model to use for converting your speech to text
ensureVoiceTranscribedCorrectly: Let's make sure your voice is being transcribed correctly
trySayingSomething: Try saying something like "Hello qSpeak" or "What a wonderful day!"
selectPersonaForConversation: Apart from basic speech-to-text functionality, qSpeak allows you to have conversations with AI using personas
followTheseStepsToTest: Follow these steps to test how the {{persona}} persona works
tryAskingFor: Try asking for code examples, explanations, or creative content.
configurationComplete: qSpeak is now configured and ready to use. You can adjust any of these settings later.
enterVerificationCode: Enter the verification code sent to {{email}}
enterEmailToLogin: Enter your email to login or create an account
createPersonaDescription: Go to Settings and create a personalized persona to customize your conversation.
configureShortcutsDescription: Open Settings to customize keyboard shortcuts and voice commands.
appPermissionsDescription: qSpeak needs access to your microphone and keyboard to provide voice commands and shortcuts
microphoneAccessDescription: Required for voice commands and dictation. qSpeak only processes audio when actively listening.
keyboardMonitoringDescription: Required for keyboard shortcuts. qSpeak only monitors specific key combinations you configure.
codeSent: Code has been sent to your email
maximizeRecordingWindowDescription: Maximize recording window by pressing {{shortcut}} and maximize your experience.
personaTip: You can create and customize your own personas later in the settings
pressTheKeyboardShortcutToBeginVoiceReco: Press the keyboard shortcut to begin voice recording
maximizeTheWindowToSeeTheConversation: Maximize the window to see the full conversation
speakMessageAndStopRecording: Say what you want to say and stop recording by pressing the shortcut again. Look at the recording window to see how the {{persona}} responds
